original: (10.5.4) ye jñānagocararatās te śānte vartmani sthitāḥ |
analyzed: ye jñāna gocara ratāḥ te śānte vartmani sthitāḥ

original: kleśoragais tu ye daṣṭās te sarve vilayaṁ gatāḥ ||
analyzed: kleśa uragaiḥ tu ye daṣṭāḥ te sarve vilayam gatāḥ
parāpara jñāḥ ye dhīrāḥ sādhavaḥ tattva darśinaḥ
te yānti paramam sthānam jarā maraṇa varjitam
sa sāra abhiratāḥ ye tu ramante kleśa śatrubhiḥ
nitya bandhana baddhāḥ te bhramanti bhava saṅkaṭe

original: (10.5.7) yasya nairyāṇikī buddhir yasya caryā śivā sadā |
analyzed: yasya nairyāṇikī buddhiḥ yasya caryā śivā sadā
tasya devanikā yasya brahma lokaḥ vidhīyate

original: (10.5.8) yasya rāgādayo dveṣyāḥ pūjyā buddhādayaḥ sadā |
analyzed: yasya rāga ādayaḥ dveṣyāḥ pūjyāḥ buddha ādayaḥ sadā
sa nāśayati sa sāram śuṣka indhanam iva analaḥ

original: (10.5.9) (108) yo na cittasya vaśagaś cittaṁ yasyānugaṁ sadā |
analyzed: yaḥ na cittasya vaśagaḥ cittam yasya anugam sadā

original: sa nirnāśayati kleśāṁs tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā ||
analyzed: sa nirnāśayati kleśāḥ tamaḥ sūrya udaye yathā

original: (10.5.10) cittaśatruḥ paraṁ śatrur na śatrur aparaḥ smṛtaḥ |
analyzed: citta śatruḥ param śatruḥ na śatruḥ aparaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: cittadagdhāḥ sadā sattvāh kāladagdhā yathā nagāḥ ||
analyzed: citta dagdhāḥ sadā sattvāḥ kāla dagdhāḥ yathā nagāḥ
yaḥ citta vaśam āpannaḥ bālaḥ mūḍhaḥ ajita indriyaḥ

original: tasya duḥkhaśamo nāsti nirvāṇaṁ tasya dūrataḥ ||
analyzed: tasya duḥkha śamaḥ na asti nirvāṇam tasya dūratas
duḥkham duḥkha vipākam ca duḥkha hetum vijānataḥ
naśyanti bandhanāḥ sarve kleśa vṛndāḥ samantataḥ

original: (10.5.13) ālokānāṁ paraṁ jñānaṁ tamasāṁ moha ucyate |
analyzed: ālokānām param jñānam tamasām mohaḥ ucyate

original: tasmād ālokanirato yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate ||
analyzed: tasmāt āloka nirataḥ yaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ ucyate

original: (10.5.14) mohaṁ vivarjayed dhīmān sarvānarthakaro hi yaḥ |
analyzed: moham vivarjayet dhīmān sarva anartha karaḥ hi yaḥ

original: yo mohavaśam āpannas tasya śāntir na vidyate ||
analyzed: yaḥ moha vaśam āpannaḥ tasya śāntiḥ na vidyate

original: (10.5.15) saṁspṛśeta varaṁ vahniṁ saṁvāsed uragair varam |
analyzed: saspṛśeta varam vahnim uragaiḥ varam

original: na kleśaiḥ saha saṁyujyed yadīcchec chreyam ātmanaḥ ||
analyzed: na kleśaiḥ saha sayujyet yadi icchet śreyam ātmanaḥ

original: (10.5.16) (109) amṛtānāṁ paraṁ jñānaṁ śreya sāṁ nidhir uttamaḥ |
bandhūnāṁ ca paro bandhur dhanānāṁ dhanam uttamam ||
analyzed: bandhūnām ca paraḥ bandhuḥ dhanānām dhanam uttamam
tasmāt jñāna agninā nityam nirdahet kleśa parvatān
kleśa parvata dagdhasya sukham padam avasthitam
andhāḥ tamasi majjante puruṣāḥ manda medhasaḥ
ye na udvijanti sa sārāt adharma raṇa pañjarāt

original: (10.5.19) teṣāṁ hi saphalaṁ janma yeṣāṁ buddhir avañcitā |
analyzed: teṣām hi saphalam janma yeṣām buddhiḥ a vañcitā

original: te ca pūjyāḥ sadā sadbhir yeṣāṁ dharme sadā matiḥ || (10.5.20) (110) ( 10.6)
analyzed: te ca pūjyāḥ sadā sadbhiḥ yeṣām dharme sadā matiḥ

original: iti sa bhikṣur evaṁ dharmādharmavidhijñaḥ sadbhūtvā viharati |
analyzed: iti sa bhikṣuḥ evam dharma adharma vidhi jñaḥ sat bhūtvā viharati
tasya evam su nirmala cetasaḥ

original: “anekāni janmaśatasahasrāṇi śikharāṇi saṁsāraparvatād viśīryante vāntībhavanti naśyanti,
analyzed: anekāni janma śata sahasrāṇi śikharāṇi sa sāra parvatāt viśīryante vāntībhavanti naśyanti
apunar bhavati iti
naśyanti ca asya kleśa śatravaḥ
antike ca asya bhavati nirvāṇam
